# textDroppableView(_:willPerformDrop:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the drop operation is about to happen.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func textDroppableView(_ textDroppableView: any UIView & UITextDroppable, willPerformDrop drop: any UITextDropRequest)
```

## Parameters

- **textDroppableView**: The text view that received the drop activity.
- **drop**: The drop request.

## Discussion

If you need to modify the drag items before the drop operation happens, provide the text view a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextPasteConfigurationSupporting/pasteDelegate] object that implements the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteConfigurationSupporting/paste(itemProviders:)] method. In the implementation, do the item conversion and paste the text.
